section.heading: Smoking prohibitions pursuant to existing law.
section.text: Nothing in this subchapter shall make lawful smoking in any place in which smoking is prohibited pursuant to § 6-1401 et seq., § 35-251(b), or any other District of Columbia or federal law.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Mar. 29, 1988, D.C. Law 7-100, § 2(j), 35 DCR 1182

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of authority under D.C. Law 3-22, the District of Columbia Smoking Restriction Act of 1979, see Mayor’s Order 90-192, December 13, 1990.
